
---
title: '充液系统动力学(四)：均匀涡旋运动'
categories: 
 - 新媒体
 - 科学网
 - 博客
headimg: 'https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202111/26/133329gm7m4utd6tg5ts9q.png'
author: 科学网
comments: false
date: Fri, 26 Nov 2021 15:20:00 GMT
thumbnail: 'https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202111/26/133329gm7m4utd6tg5ts9q.png'
---

<div>   
<p class="MsoListParagraph" style="margin-left:52px;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;"><strong>1.<span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; line-height: normal;">       </span></strong><strong>液体的刚体转动：<span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"></span></strong></span></p><p style="text-indent: 29px; line-height: 150%; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;">前篇博文<span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">中叙述了椭球腔内无旋理想流体的等效刚体。对于球腔的特殊情形，腔内流体可如同刚体一样做整体转动。此时充液刚体的运动与带球形转子的刚体完全相同。腔内的流体运动为有旋流动。以 </span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><strong><em>Ω</em></strong><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">′ </span></span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">表示液体团在主刚体内作刚体转动的相对角速度，则流体质点的相对速度为</span></span></p><p style="text-indent: 29px; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 宋体;">                      <img src="https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202111/26/133329gm7m4utd6tg5ts9q.png" title alt="均匀1.png" width="103" height="31" style="width: 103px; height: 31px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">                           (1)<br></span></p><p style="text-align: justify;"><span style="font-size: 16px; font-family: "times new roman";">将<span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"> <strong><em>u</em></strong></span><strong><em> </em></strong>投影至主刚体坐标系 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;">(<em>O-x</em><sub>1</sub><em>x</em><sub>2</sub><em>x</em><sub>3</sub>)</span>，得到</span><br></p><p style="text-align: center;"><span style="font-size: 16px; font-family: "times new roman";">                                                              <img src="https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202111/26/133527lre3vl3i3q3t34qz.png" title alt="均匀2.png" width="180" height="118" style="width: 180px; height: 118px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">                                                         (2)<br></span></p><p><span style="font-size: 16px; font-family: "times new roman";"></span></p><p style="text-indent: 28px; line-height: 150%; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;">博文 “<span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">充液系统动力学 (二) </span>” 中曾给出流体的旋度 (rotation) 与涡量 (vorticity) 的概念。说明<span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">流场中除由速度</span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;"> </span><strong><em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">v </span></em></strong></span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">构成的速度场以外，还存在由</span>旋度 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;">rot<strong><em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">v = </span></em></strong><strong>▽</strong>×<strong><em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">v </span></em></strong></span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">构成的旋度场。</span>旋度之半称为<span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">流体的涡量。如主刚体静止，将</span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px; text-align: justify; text-indent: 28px; line-height: 30px;"> </span><strong style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px; text-align: justify; text-indent: 28px; white-space: normal;"><em><span style="line-height: 30px;">v </span></em></strong><strong><em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;"></span></em></strong><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">以 </span><strong><em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px; text-align: justify;"> </span><strong style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px; text-align: justify; white-space: normal;"><em>u</em></strong> </span></em></strong><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">代替，利用式 (2) 计算得到的涡量为</span></span></p><p style="text-align: center;"><span style="font-size: 16px; font-family: "times new roman";">                                                      <img src="https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202111/26/133746a4cr3f00rbjcdi03.png" title alt="均匀3.png" width="216" height="66" style="width: 216px; height: 66px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">                                                           (3)</span><br></p><p><span style="font-size: 16px; font-family: "times new roman";"></span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">表明流场内每个点的涡量相同，均等于流体团的转动角速度 </span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><strong><em>Ω</em></strong><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">′</span></span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">。如主刚体以 </span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><strong><em>ω</em></strong></span><strong><em> </em></strong><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">角速度转动，则液体团的绝对涡量为 </span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><strong><em>Ω = Ω</em></strong><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">′+</span><strong><em>ω</em></strong></span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">，也就是液体团的绝对角速度。流场内各点的绝对速度 </span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><strong><em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">v </span></em></strong></span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">为</span></span></p><p style="line-height: 150%; text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">                                                                       <img src="https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202111/26/134023nqd57sgld7f77zq5.png" title alt="均匀4.png" width="99" height="32" style="width: 99px; height: 32px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">                                                                                    (4)<br></span></p><p style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;"><br></span></p><p><span style="font-size: 16px; font-family: "times new roman";"></span></p><p class="MsoListParagraph" style="margin-left:52px;line-height:150%"><span style="font-size: 16px; font-family: "times new roman";"><strong>2.<span style="font-size: 16px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; line-height: normal;">       </span></strong><strong>均匀涡旋运动：</strong></span></p><p style="text-indent:29px;line-height:150%"><span style="font-size: 16px; font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei";"><span style="font-size: 16px; line-height: 150%;">流体的刚体转动仅限于球形腔。在其它任何非球形腔内，由于腔壁的约束，刚体转动均不可能实现。但椭球腔内的流体有一种流动与刚体转动十分接近。设椭球腔</span><span style="font-size: 16px;">壁 </span><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; font-size: 20px;"><em>Σ</em></span><em><span style="font-size: 16px;"> </span></em><span style="font-size: 16px;">的曲面方程为</span></span></p><p style="text-align: center;"><span style="font-size: 16px; font-family: "times new roman";">                                           <img src="https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202111/26/134230rwgs0wiuugwwp5uc.png" title alt="均匀5.png" width="362" height="76" style="width: 362px; height: 76px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">             </span><span style="font-family: "times new roman";">                            (5)</span></p><p><span style="font-family: "times new roman";"><span style="font-size: 16px;">利用以下坐标变换可将椭球腔变换为球腔（图 1）：</span><span style="font-size: 14px;"></span></span><span style="font-size: 16px; font-family: "times new roman";"><br></span></p><p style="text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;">                                                      <img src="https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202111/26/134511eegilj6aai60z0la.png" title alt="均匀6.png" width="263" height="49" style="width: 263px; height: 49px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">                                                 (6)<br></span></p><p><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;"><br></span></p><p><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;"><br></span></p><p style="text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;"><img src="data:image/png;base64," alt width="607" height="275" style="width: 607px; height: 275px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"><br></span></p><p style="text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;"></span></p><p style="text-align:center;text-indent:29px;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; line-height: 150%;">图1   椭球腔与变换后的球腔</span></p><p style="text-indent: 29px; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; line-height: 150%;"><br></span></p><p style="text-indent: 29px; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; line-height: 150%;"></span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">设流体在球腔内以相对角速度 </span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><strong><em>Ω</em></strong><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">′<sub>0</sub></span></span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;"><sub> </sub>作刚体转动。流体质点的相对速度 </span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><strong><em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">u</span></em></strong><sub><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">0</span></sub></span><sub><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;"> </span></sub><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">在球腔参考坐标系 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%; font-size: 20px;">(<em>O-x</em><sub>01</sub><em> x</em><sub>02</sub><em> x</em><sub>03</sub>)</span> 中</span>的<span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">投影如式 (1), (2) 所示，仅增加下标<span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%; font-size: 20px;"> 0</span> 以区别于椭球腔内的实际流速:</span></span></p><p style="line-height: 150%; text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">                                                                           <img src="https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202111/26/135042ye4wc3eczew8939h.png" title alt="均匀7.png" width="117" height="38" style="width: 117px; height: 38px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">                                                                     (7)<br></span></p><p style="text-indent: 29px; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; line-height: 150%;"></span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;">球腔内的流速 <strong><em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;"></span></em></strong><strong style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px; white-space: normal;"><em><span style="line-height: 30px;">u</span></em></strong><sub style="font-family: "times new roman"; white-space: normal;"><span style="line-height: 25px;">0</span></sub><sub><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;"></span></sub><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">与椭球腔内的实际流速 </span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><strong><em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">u </span></em></strong></span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">之间满足与式 (6) 相同的比例关系：</span></span></p><p style="line-height: 150%; text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">                                                          <img src="https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202111/26/135241inkfa1dq52bbtnzd.png" title alt="均匀8.png" width="250" height="47" style="width: 250px; height: 47px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">                                                   (8)<br></span></p><p style="text-indent: 29px; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; line-height: 150%;"></span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">将式 (6), (7) 代入式 (8)，导出流体在椭球腔内的实际流速 </span><strong><em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;"><strong style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px; white-space: normal;"><em><span style="line-height: 30px;">u </span></em></strong> </span></em></strong><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">：</span></span></p><p style="line-height: 150%; text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">                                                  <img src="https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202111/26/135453dd2gk0bi43gk6d2i.png" title alt="均匀9.png" width="272" height="239" style="width: 272px; height: 239px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">                                                (9)</span></p><p style="text-indent: 29px; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; line-height: 150%;"></span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">为验证流速 </span><strong><em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;"><strong style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px; white-space: normal;"><em><span style="line-height: 30px;">u </span></em></strong></span></em></strong><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">能否满足椭球腔壁处法向速度为零的边界条件：</span></span></p><p style="line-height: 150%; text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">                                              <img src="https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202111/26/135703ed3k6d176jjhgz1g.png" title alt="均匀10.png" width="288" height="74" style="width: 288px; height: 74px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">                                               (10)<br></span></p><p style="text-indent: 29px; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; line-height: 150%;"></span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">将式 (5) 和式 (9) 代入后，可使此条件成为恒等式。表明上述流动可不受椭球腔壁的约束自由进行（图 2）。将式 (9) 代入式 (3) 计算椭球腔内的实际涡量</span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;"> </span><strong><em>Ω</em></strong><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">′</span></span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">，得到</span></span></p><p style="line-height: 150%; text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">                                                       <img src="https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202111/26/135859fq8gnmchkn0mcm02.png" title alt="均匀11.png" width="217" height="267" style="width: 217px; height: 267px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">                                                        (11)<br></span></p><p style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-size: 16px;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; text-align: justify; line-height: 150%;">与球腔类似，椭球腔流场内每个点的涡量 </span><strong style="font-family: "times new roman"; text-align: justify;"></strong><strong style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px; white-space: normal;"><em>Ω</em></strong><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px; line-height: 30px;">′ </span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; text-align: justify; line-height: 150%;">均相同。可将涡量  </span><strong style="font-family: "times new roman"; text-align: justify;"></strong><strong style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px; white-space: normal;"><em>Ω</em></strong><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px; line-height: 30px;">′ </span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; text-align: justify; line-height: 150%;"></span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; text-align: justify;">作为描述腔内流体运动状态的离散化参数。</span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; text-align: justify; line-height: 150%;">庞加莱 (Poincaré,H) 将这种特殊的流动称为流体在椭球腔内的<strong>简单流动</strong>。由于每个点的涡量相同，也</span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; text-align: justify;">称为流体的</span><strong style="font-family: "times new roman"; text-align: justify;">均匀涡旋运动</strong><strong style="font-family: "times new roman"; text-align: justify;"> </strong><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; text-align: justify;">(homogeneous vortex motion) (图 2)。</span></span><br></p><p style="line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;"></span></p><p style="text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;"><br></span></p><p style="text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;"><img src="data:image/png;base64," alt width="465" height="356" style="width: 465px; height: 356px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></span><br></p><p style="text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;">图2   椭球腔内流体的均匀涡旋运动</span><span style="font-size: 16px; font-family: 宋体;"><br></span></p><p><br></p><p><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;"></span></p><p style="text-indent:28px;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;">若主刚体以角速度 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><strong><em>ω</em></strong></span><strong><em> </em></strong>转动，则流体的绝对涡量为 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><strong><em>Ω = ω+Ω</em></strong><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">′</span></span>。<span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">流体质点的绝对速度为</span></span></p><p style="text-indent: 28px; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">                  <img src="https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202111/26/140402znyc227c4pe1piu5.png" title alt="均匀12.png" width="478" height="46" style="width: 478px; height: 46px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">                (12)<br></span></p><p><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">表明若椭球腔内的流体团以角速度 </span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><strong><em>Ω</em></strong></span><strong><em> </em></strong>做<span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">刚性转动，所产生的速度 </span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><strong><em>Ω</em></strong>×<strong><em>r </em></strong></span>必须增加<span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">速度增量 </span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><strong><em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">v</span></em></strong>*</span>，方能满足腔壁的边界条件。此速度增量可从上式中解出，得到</span><span style="font-family: "times new roman";"><br></span></p><p style="text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman";">                                                            <img src="https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202111/26/141039igtatjxt9cthxqgt.png" title alt="均匀14.png" width="158" height="36" style="width: 158px; height: 36px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">                                                                      (13)<br></span></p><p><span style="font-family: "times new roman";"></span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">将式 (9) 代入上式，其中 </span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><strong><em>Ω</em></strong><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">′<sub>0 </sub></span></span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">利用式 (11) 化作以 </span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><strong><em>Ω</em></strong><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">′ </span></span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">表示，导出</span></span></p><p style="line-height: 150%; text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">              <img src="https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202111/26/141258ier9eog1182j7eg7.png" title alt="均匀14.png" width="545" height="260" style="width: 545px; height: 260px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">                   (14)<br></span></p><p><span style="font-family: "times new roman";"></span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">不难看出，速度增量 </span><strong><em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;"></span></em></strong><strong style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px; white-space: normal;"><em><span style="line-height: 30px;">v</span></em></strong><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;">*</span> 存在<span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">势函数</span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;"> </span><strong><em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">v</span></em></strong>* = <strong>▽</strong><em>ϕ</em>，<em>ϕ = <strong>ψ</strong></em>·(<strong><em>ω</em></strong><em>-<strong>Ω</strong></em>)</span>，其中 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><strong><em>ψ</em></strong></span><strong><em> </em></strong>即<span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">博文 “充液系统动力学 (三)” 中导出的椭球腔的茹可夫斯基势函数:</span></span></p><p style="line-height: 150%; text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;"><img src="https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202111/26/141537qpey3xxltgymdbgz.png" title alt="均匀15.png" width="659" height="85" style="width: 659px; height: 85px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">   (15)<br></span></p><p><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman";">与椭球腔内无旋液体的势函数 </span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em><span style="font-family: "times new roman";">ϕ = <strong>ψ</strong></span></em><span style="font-family: "times new roman";">·<strong><em>ω</em></strong></span></span><span style="font-family: "times new roman";">比较，仅须将其中的 </span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><strong><em><span style="font-family: "times new roman";">ω</span></em></strong></span><strong><em><span style="font-family: "times new roman";"> </span></em></strong><span style="font-family: "times new roman";">换作</span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman";"> </span><strong><em><span style="font-family: "times new roman";">ω-Ω </span></em></strong></span><span style="font-family: "times new roman";">。于是均匀涡旋运动的流动规律可视为刚体转动与有势的附加流动的叠加，即</span><br></span></p><p style="text-align: center;"><span style="font-size: 16px; font-family: "times new roman";">                                                         <img src="https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202111/26/141739krxsl2blx9nxsnsp.png" title alt="均匀16.png" width="166" height="38" style="width: 166px; height: 38px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">                                                            (16)<br></span></p><p><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;"><span style="font-size: 16px;">球腔作为椭球腔的特例，令 </span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em>a</em><sub>1 </sub><em>= a</em><sub>2 </sub><em>= a</em><sub>3</sub></span><span style="font-size: 16px;">，则 </span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><strong><em>v</em></strong>* = <strong>▽</strong><em>ϕ </em>= 0</span><span style="font-size: 16px;">，附加流动和对应的势函数均不存在。</span><br></span></p><p><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;"><br></span></p><p><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;"></span></p><p class="MsoListParagraph" style="margin-left:52px;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;"><strong><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">3.<span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; line-height: normal;">       </span></span></strong><strong><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">亥姆霍兹方程与涡量守恒定理</span></strong></span></p><p class="MsoListParagraph" style="margin-left:52px;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: "times new roman";"><strong><span style="line-height: 150%;"></span></strong></span></p><p style="text-indent:28px;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">前文 </span>“<span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">充液系统动力学 (一)</span>” 中曾导出流体的动力学方程。如忽略流体的粘性，称为<strong>欧拉水动力学方程</strong>：</span></p><p style="text-indent: 28px; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman";">                       <img src="https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202111/26/142602dzth1fz6pa8mmw13.png" title alt="均匀17.png" width="502" height="74" style="width: 502px; height: 74px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">               (17)<br></span></p><p class="MsoListParagraph" style="margin-left: 52px; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman";"><strong><span style="line-height: 150%;"></span></strong></span></p><p style="line-height: 150%; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;">令哈密顿算子<span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><strong> ▽</strong></span><strong> </strong>与各项<span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">叉积，计算此方程各项的</span>旋度<span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"> rot</span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">。设体积力 </span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><strong><em>f </em></strong></span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">为有势力，其旋度为零。利用</span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">rot</span><strong>▽ </strong><strong>= </strong><strong>▽</strong>×<strong>▽ </strong><strong>= </strong>0</span>，则 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><strong>▽</strong><em>p</em></span><em> </em>的<span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">旋度亦为零。将上式展开，经过适当的数学推导化作</span><sup><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">[1]</span></sup></span></p><p class="MsoListParagraph" style="margin-left: 52px; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman";"><strong><span style="line-height: 150%;">                            <img src="https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202111/26/142807wacn3fjc8aej667c.png" title alt="均匀18.png" width="366" height="67" style="width: 366px; height: 67px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">                               </span></strong><span style="line-height: 150%;">    (18)</span></span><br></p><p><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;"></span></p><p style="line-height: 150%; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">涡量 </span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><strong><em>Ω</em></strong></span><strong><em> </em></strong><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">必须满足的此微分方程称为<strong>亥姆霍兹 </strong></span><strong><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">(Helmholtz,H.) </span></strong><strong><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">方程</span></strong><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">。一般情况下，亥姆霍兹方程 (19) 中的 </span><strong><em><strong style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px; text-align: justify; white-space: normal;"><em>Ω</em></strong> </em></strong><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">是坐标 </span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">x<sub>j </sub></span></em>(<em>j </em>= 1,2,3)</span> 和时间 <span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em>t</em></span><em> </em>的函数。上述<span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">椭圆腔内的均匀涡旋运动是唯一的特例，流场内各点的涡量相同，方程 (18) 成为常微分方程：</span></span></p><p style="text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;">                                                     <img src="https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202111/26/143008p1go1t7k1r1bml9e.png" title alt="均匀19.png" width="244" height="73" style="width: 244px; height: 73px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">                                                      (19)</span><br></p><p><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;"></span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%; font-size: 16px;">将式 (9),(12) 代入方程 (19)，导出其投影式：  </span></p><p style="text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;">                   <img src="https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202111/26/143255fh7uv3kmwvwnewp7.png" title alt="均匀20.png" width="545" height="300" style="width: 545px; height: 300px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">             (20)</span><br></p><p><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;"></span></p><p style="text-indent:28px;line-height:150%"><span style=";line-height:150%;font-family:宋体"></span></p><p style="text-indent:28px;line-height:150%"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">将此方程组的各式分别乘以</span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;"> </span><em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">a</span></em><sub><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">2</span></sub><sup><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">2</span></sup><em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;"> a</span></em><sub><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">3</span></sub><sup><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">2</span></sup><em>Ω</em><sub><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">1</span></sub><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">,<em>  a</em><sub>3</sub><sup>2</sup><em> a</em><sub>1</sub><sup>2</sup></span><em>Ω</em><sub><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">2</span></sub><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">,<em>  a</em><sub>1</sub><sup>2</sup><em> a</em><sub>2</sub><sup>2</sup></span><em>Ω</em><sub><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">3</span></sub></span><sub><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;"> </span></sub><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">后相加，得到</span></span></p><p style="text-indent: 28px; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman";"><span style="line-height: 150%;">                              <img src="https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202111/26/150438lnvxp4pcpzesa4s8.png" title alt="均匀21.png" width="420" height="67" style="width: 420px; height: 67px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">                            (21)<br></span></span></p><p style="text-indent: 28px; line-height: 150%;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman";"><span style="line-height: 150%;"></span></span></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: 微软雅黑, "Microsoft YaHei"; font-size: 16px;">积分得到</span></p><p style="text-indent: 28px; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">                               <img src="https://cors.zfour.workers.dev/?http://image.sciencenet.cn/home/202111/26/144014y52yb4l45nva76st.png" title alt="均匀22.png" width="385" height="41" style="width: 385px; height: 41px;" referrerpolicy="no-referrer">                                  (22)<br></span></p><p style="text-indent:28px;line-height:150%"><span style=";line-height: 150%;font-family:宋体"></span></p><p style="line-height: 150%; text-align: justify;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;"><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">此初积分称为<strong>亥姆霍兹涡量守恒定理</strong>，即椭球腔内理想流体的涡量</span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><strong><em>Ω</em></strong></span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">的模不随时间变化。涡量守恒是无力矩状态下动量矩守恒的必然结果。对于球形腔特殊情形，令</span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">a</span></em><sub><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">1</span></sub><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">=<em> a</em><sub>2</sub><em> </em>=<em> a</em><sub>3</sub></span></span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">，化作 </span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 20px;"><em>Ω </em><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">= const</span></span><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; line-height: 150%;">，即流体团的旋转角速度守恒。</span></span></p><p><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;"></span></p><p style="text-indent: 29px; line-height: 150%; text-align: justify;"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;">综上所述，对于刚体与椭球腔内有旋理想流体组成的系统，可将刚体的角速度和流体团的涡量作为离散化变量，列写刚体的动力学方程和流体的涡量方程做动力学分析。但此数学模型仅限于椭球腔。关于非椭球腔的更一般情形将另文叙述。</span></p><p style="text-indent: 29px; line-height: 150%; text-align: justify;"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: "times new roman";"><br></span></p><p style="text-indent: 29px; line-height: 150%; text-align: justify;"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: "times new roman";"></span></p><p style="text-indent:29px;line-height:150%"><strong><span style=";line-height:150%;font-family:宋体">参考文献</span></strong><span style=";line-height:150%;font-family:宋体">：</span></p><p style="text-indent:29px;line-height:150%"><span style=";line-height:150%;font-family:'Times New Roman',serif">[1]  Kochin,N.E., Kibel,I.A., Rose,N.V., Theoretical Hydromechanics, New York: </span><span style="font-family: "Times New Roman", serif; text-indent: 56px;">Interscience Publishers, 1964</span></p><p style="text-indent: 29px; line-height: 150%; text-align: justify;"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: "times new roman";"></span><br></p><p style="line-height:150%"><span style=";line-height: 150%;font-family:宋体">     <span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: "times new roman";">（改写自：王照林，刘延柱. 充液系统动力学. 第3章. 北京：科学出版社，2002</span></span></p><p style="text-indent:70px;line-height:150%"><span style=";line-height:150%;font-family:宋体">     <span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: "times new roman";"> 刘延柱. 陀螺力学(第二版)，第10章. 北京：科学出版社，2009）</span></span></p><p style="text-indent: 29px; line-height: 150%; text-align: justify;"><br></p><p style="text-indent: 29px; line-height: 150%; text-align: justify;"><span style="line-height: 150%; font-family: "times new roman";"><br></span></p><p><span style="font-family: "times new roman"; font-size: 16px;"></span><br></p>                    <br><br>

</div>
